definition: straight/to straighten/fair and reasonable/frank/straightforward/(indicates continuing motion or action)/vertical/vertical downward stroke in Chinese characters
surname Zhi/Zhi (c. 2000 BC), fifth of the legendary Flame Emperors 炎帝[Yan2 di4] descended from Shennong 神農|神农[Shen2 nong2] Farmer God

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
diagram/picture/drawing/chart/map/CL:張|张[zhang1]/to plan/to scheme/to attempt/to pursue/to seek

sentences.english: Any process which "stretches" the histogram has the potential to cause posterization.
sentences.chinese: 任何过程，“延伸”的直方图有可能导致色调分离。

sentences.english: A binary mapping law(BML) for histogram processing of digital image.
sentences.chinese: 用于数字图像直方图处理的一种二值映射规则。

sentences.english: The image segmentation method based on the maximum entropy of the one-dimensional bound histogram(ODBH) is also used.
sentences.chinese: 同时，也使用一维属性直方图的最大熵分割法。

sentences.english: Conversely, if the histogram skews towards the right, then the image is potentially overexposed.
sentences.chinese: 相反的，如果直方图集中在右侧，说明图像过曝。
总体分布直方图也可以得到。

sentences.english: Color histograms and edge histograms were used to model the object observations likelihoods function.
sentences.chinese: 颜色直方图和边缘直方图一起构建目标观测似然函数。

sentences.english: Color histograms and edge histograms were used to model the object observations likelihoods function.
sentences.chinese: 颜色直方图和边缘直方图一起构建目标观测似然函数。

sentences.english: Many image display controls, such as colormap, histogram, transparency, etc.
sentences.chinese: 大量显示控制，诸如渲染，直方图，反色等。

sentences.english: The algorithms of scene change detection are based on histogram differences.
sentences.chinese: 场景变化检测算法是基于直方图之差的。

sentences.english: It is difficult to choose the threshold value when the histogram of images is not evidently bimodal .
sentences.chinese: 图像的直方图双峰不明显时，选择分割阈值就很困难。

sentences.english: Conditional frequencies are perhaps more interesting than plain histograms.
sentences.chinese: 条件频率分布可能比普通的直方图更有趣。

sentences.english: The method is better than traditional homomorphic filtering and histogram equalization.
sentences.chinese: 该方法明显优于经典的同态增晰法和直方图均衡化。

sentences.english: An image equalization method modified with bit-rig ht is discussed.
sentences.chinese: 探讨了一种改进的直方图均衡化方法。

sentences.english: Bi-color clustering based on the color histogram was performed.
sentences.chinese: 计算各区域内的颜色统计直方图，进行二类颜色聚类。

sentences.english: YUV picture improvement processor based on histogram modification.
sentences.chinese: YUV图像改进处理器基于直方图修改。

definition: to fit (data to a model)/a (close) fit
contrast (balance of black and white in TV screen setup)/degree of contrast
